channel.title: Tor not fully bootstrapped
channel.description:
Hi,
I wanted to report a minor bug, while my VM was downloading apt-get updates I tried to open Tor Browser Updater and it gave me this error.
Tor not fully bootstrapped
Possible reasons: - no internet connectivity

item.title: Tor not fully bootstrapped
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Thanks. Will be fixed in Whonix 9.

Read full topic

Hi,

I wanted to report a minor bug, while my VM was downloading apt-get updates I tried to open Tor Browser Updater and it gave me this error.

Possible reasons:
